segments.text: I see the woman is so absorbed in drying that plate, she doesn't see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring, climbing up to get those cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching him, that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so cute, waiting for her cookie with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed the water yet, it's all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, it's a shame they're all stuck inside with this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spreading everywhere, it's going to be a big cleanup job.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the children have been sneaking cookies like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, he must really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the mess soon, before someone gets hurt or something breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR
